Subtitle: [Jianyu] Number five is number one. Number seven is number two.
[Jianyu] Number five is number one. Number seven is number two.
Number three and number four are tied for number three.
What are you talking about?
I'm ranking my favorite Fast and the Furious movies.
You said you wanted to know who I am, / and this is the best way to get to know me.
Translation:
내가 누군지 알고 싶다고 했잖아요
날 알고 싶다면 / 내가 누군지 알고 싶다고 했잖아요
날 알고 싶다면 이 방법이 최고거든요

Subtitle: No, it isn't.
You could tell me your real name, for starters.
My name is Jason Mendoza. I'm from Florida / and I'm a professional, amateur deejay.
Translation:
내 이름은 제이슨 멘도사예요 플로리다에서 왔고
전문 아마추어 DJ죠 / 플로리다에서 왔고
전문 아마추어 DJ죠

Subtitle: -And, is that a family member? -I wish.
Translation:
저 사람은 가족이에요? 그랬으면 좋겠지만
쟨 아리아나 그란데예요

Subtitle: That's Ariana Grande, the sexiest woman alive.
Translation:
그랬으면 좋겠지만
쟨 아리아나 그란데예요 지구에서 가장 섹시한 여자

Subtitle: You wish that you were related to a woman you want to have sex with.
Translation:
섹스를 하고 싶은 사람이랑
가족이었으면 좋겠다고요?

Subtitle: You know what? It'd be one thing if you just weren't a Buddhist monk, / but you're barely even a regular, functioning person.
Translation:
스님이 아닌 건 그렇다 쳐도 / 하다못해 평범하게
제 기능을 하는 사람도 아니네요

Subtitle: How did you get here?
I don't know, but, please, dawg, you can't tell Michael about me.
Translation:
몰라요, 하지만 부탁이에요 마이클한테
내 얘긴 하지 말아줘요

Subtitle: You have some nerve asking me for favors / when you have spent weeks deceiving me, making a fool out of me, / and bringing snack food into my house.
Translation:
몇 주 동안 날 속이면서 / 바보로 만들고
내 집에서 이런 거나 먹으면서 그런 부탁까지 하다니
진짜 뻔뻔하네요 / 그런 부탁까지 하다니
진짜 뻔뻔하네요

Subtitle: Disgusting!
Oh, Ariana, we're really in it now.
Shawn, the judge, could show up at any moment, / so we need to have a rock-solid argument / for why Fake Eleanor should not be sent to The Bad Place.
Translation:
숀 판사님이
언제든 나타날 수 있으니 / 왜 가짜 엘리너가
배드 플레이스로 가면 안 되는지 / 왜 가짜 엘리너가
배드 플레이스로 가면 안 되는지 완벽한 논거를 준비해야 해요

Subtitle: -Should be fun. -That's the spirit!
Don't even think about the fact / that our slightest misstep could cause Fake Eleanor / to suffer for eternity.
Translation:
우리의 사소한 실수 하나가 / 가짜 엘리너를 영원한
고통에 처하게 할 수 있단 건 / 생각조차 하지 맙시다

Subtitle: That's all I'm thinking about now.
Yep, shouldn't have said that. Regretted it immediately.
Translation:
그 말은 하지 말 걸 그랬네요
바로 후회했어요

Subtitle: Bambadjan was a human rights advocate, / so he and Real Eleanor will build a sort of legal argument.
Translation:
밤바잔은 인권 변호사였으니 / 진짜 엘리너와 함께
법적인 부분을 맡을 겁니다

Subtitle: Um... [clears throat] Could you please just say, "Eleanor?"
And maybe point to whichever one of us you're addressing?
Well, actually, the fake/real distinction helps me.
Translation:
사실 가짜, 진짜로
구분하는 게 도움이 되거든요

Subtitle: Oh, does it, Bambadjan?
Now, I know a fair amount about your time on Earth.
Translation:
지구에서의 당신 삶에 대해선
충분히 알았으니

Subtitle: Why don't you tell me about your time here?
Anything that might help your case.
Translation:
이 사건에 도움을
줄 만한 건 뭐든지요

Subtitle: Well, in the first 24 hours, I caused the world to erupt into chaos, / and then I caused a garbage storm.
Translation:
처음 24시간 동안
저는 이 세상을 혼돈 속으로 몰아넣고
쓰레기 폭풍을 일으켰죠 / 혼돈 속으로 몰아넣고
쓰레기 폭풍을 일으켰죠

Subtitle: It was kind of a rough start, / but things calmed down after Chidi started helping me / learn about ethics.
Translation:
시작이 좋진 않았지만 / 치디한테 윤리에 대해
배우기 시작하면서 / 상황이 진정됐어요

Subtitle: Okay, tell me about that.
Translation: 그럼 그 얘기를 좀 더 해보죠

Subtitle: Well, I studied with Chidi every day, and then Chidi got sick of me, / so I did some nice stuff to make him feel better.
Translation:
매일 치디와 공부를 했는데
치디가 저한테 질려버려서 / 치디의 기분이 나아질
뭔가 멋진 일을 했어요

Subtitle: And later, I confessed because Chidi / was being tortured by guilt, and I just felt awful, / seeing his little, nerdy face all contorted.
Translation:
근데 나중에
그 착해빠진 얼굴이 / 죄책감으로 일그러진 걸 보니
마음이 좋지 않아서 / 그냥 사실대로 털어놨어요

Subtitle: "Oh, Eleanor, / "I have a stomach ache because of what you did." [laughs]
Translation:
엘리너 / 당신이 한 짓 때문에
배가 너무 아프네요

Subtitle: He is such a dork.
You know, uh, a lot of death row inmates feel regret about things they never said, / admissions of guilt, or anger, or love.
Translation:
사형수들은 보통
말 못 한 게 후회된다고들 해요 죄나 분노, 혹은...
사랑을 고백하지 못해서요 / 죄나 분노, 혹은...
사랑을 고백하지 못해서요

Subtitle: Are you making a move on me?
It's fine. I just didn't see it coming.
-Uh... -Well, hooking up with someone / with the exact same name, it is kind of a fun, narcissistic fantasy--
Translation:
이름이 똑같은 사람과 엮이는 건 / 재밌는 자아도취적
환상 같긴 한데...

Subtitle: No, no, Eleanor, I'm talking--
-I could be into it. -Mmm. No, I'm talking about you and Chidi.
Translation:
- 할 수 있을 것 같아요
- 치디와 당신 얘길 하는 거예요

Subtitle: Now, ordinarily, you having feelings for my soul mate / -would be a conflict of interest-- -Whoa, whoa, whoa!
Translation:
내 소울메이트에 당신이 관심을 보이면
이해 상충이긴 하지만... / 당신이 관심을 보이면
이해 상충이긴 하지만...

Subtitle: You think I'm into Chidi?
Yes, Eleanor, I do.
Because you are.
You mentioned his name nine times in the last ten minutes.
Nobody asked you, Bambadjan.
I'm not sure what will work with Shawn, but we should have all our bases covered.
Translation:
숀한테 어떤 게
먹힐지 모르겠지만 모든 가능성을 따져봐야 해요

Subtitle: Shall we start with the Greeks, / or would you prefer the modern British masters?
Translation:
그리스부터 시작할까요? / 아니면 현대 영국의 대가를
선호하나요?

Subtitle: Chidi?
I'm sorry, choices are hard for me when I'm under pressure.
I know that, buddy, but we're short of time here, / and it's kind of important for Eleanor.
Translation:
그건 저도 압니다만
시간이 없네요 / 그리고 엘리너에게
중요한 일이니까요

Subtitle: Right, which is why I can't take this lightly. What if I screw up?
Translation:
네, 그래서 그냥 가볍게
여기지 못하는 거예요 제가 망치면 어떡해요?

Subtitle: Listen, I don't need the Chidi who once had a panic attack / during Rock-Paper-Scissors because there were, and I quote, / "just too many variables."
Translation:
가위바위보를 하다가
공황 발작을 겪었을 때의 모습은 / 필요 없어요
그때 이렇게 말했죠? / '변수가 너무 많아요'

Subtitle: I need the Chidi who stormed in here and told me to stop / Eleanor's train without thinking of consequences.
Translation:
지금 필요한 건 엘리너의 기차를 멈추기 위해
결과는 생각하지 않고 여기로 뛰어들어왔던
그때의 치디라고요 / 여기로 뛰어들어왔던
그때의 치디라고요

Subtitle: Oh, boy, now I'm nervous about that decision.
Retroactively? I mean, how do you even?
I don't know.
Okay, we have so many big choices to make. Let's start small.
Translation:
알겠어요, 우리에겐
선택해야 할 게 많아요 사소한 것부터 시작해보죠

Subtitle: Do you want to use a dry erase board or the regular pen and paper?
Translation: 화이트보드를 쓸까요? 아니면 그냥 종이와 펜을 쓸까요?

Subtitle: Just pick.
[Uzo] Chidi, just pick!
Come on, Chidi, pick someone.
Don't pressure me, Uzo. I have to consider all the factors.
Translation:
부담 주지 마, 우조
고려할 게 많단 말이야 경기 전략과 친구들의 정신력

Subtitle: Athletic strategies, / the fragile egos of my classmates, and gender politics.
Translation: 경기 전략과 친구들의 정신력 / 또 성별에 따른 선택도 고려해야지

Subtitle: Should I pick a girl / as a gesture towards women's equality, or is that pandering?
Translation:
여성 평등을 지지한다는 의미로
여자를 골라야 하나? / 여성 평등을 지지한다는 의미로
여자를 골라야 하나? 아니면 그게 더 정치적인가?

Subtitle: Or do I think it's pandering / because of my limited male point of view? I'm vexed, Uzo, vexed.
Translation:
내가 남자 입장에서만 보느라 / 내가 남자 입장에서만 보느라 그게 정치적이라고 생각하는 걸까?
나 정말 곤란해

Subtitle: You're always vexed. Just pick.
Okay, fine, I choose Tokunbo.
You can't draft the teacher. Pick a kid.
-[kid] Come on, Chidi. Just pick someone. -[all clamoring]
Congratulations, Chidi. You filibustered recess.
Translation:
축하해, 치디
너 때문에 쉬는 시간 끝났잖아

Subtitle: No, no, no, you're wrong.
There are way more things I hate about Chidi than like about him.
Translation:
치디에 관해 좋아하는 점보다
싫어하는 게 더 많다고요

Subtitle: Like what?
[scoffs] His stupid Clark Kent glasses, his extensive turtleneck collection, / oh, and he loves ethics so much.
Translation:
범생이 안경
목 늘어난 터틀넥 스웨터 / 그리고 치디는
윤리를 참 좋아해요

Subtitle: He once talked about John Rawls for two hours. I timed it.
Translation:
그리고 치디는
윤리를 참 좋아해요 존 롤스 얘기만 2시간을 한 적도
있어요, 내가 시간 재봤거든요

Subtitle: And, he only stopped because he saw me timing him.
Translation:
제가 시간 재는 걸 보고
멈추더라고요

Subtitle: Granted, he laughed, and kind of made fun of himself, / it was a nice moment, but still.
Translation:
그리고 당연히 웃으면서
자기가 한 짓을 창피해했죠 / 재밌기는 했지만 그래도 별로예요

Subtitle: He always twitches his eyebrows when he says "absolutism,"
Translation:
'절대론'이라는 단어를 말할 땐 눈썹을 씰룩거리고
제가 무식한 말을 할 때마다

Subtitle: and he tilts his head whenever I say anything ignorant, / but he never makes fun of me, which is nice.
Translation:
눈썹을 씰룩거리고
제가 무식한 말을 할 때마다 머리를 갸우뚱해요 / 하지만 날 놀리지 않는 건
정말 좋아요

Subtitle: He's also incredibly patient, and kind, and surprisingly jacked, / and, oh, fork, I'm in love with Chidi.
Translation:
인내심도 많고 친절하고 몸도 얼마나 좋은지 몰라요
이런, 젠장 / 몸도 얼마나 좋은지 몰라요
이런, 젠장 내가 치디를 좋아하나 봐요

Subtitle: Let's take a little break.
I know this is awkward, / but as your advocate, and, I hope, friend, / I think you should tell Chidi how you feel.
Translation:
이 상황이 좀 이상하지만 / 당신의 변호인으로서
그리고 친구로서 바라건대 / 치디에게 그 감정을
얘기하는 게 좋을 것 같아요

Subtitle: Would a hug make you feel better?
No, I don't think that it would--
Oh, too late, you're getting one.
Thanks, Bambadjan, that does make me feel better.
Translation:
늦었어요, 이미 안고 있어요 고마워요, 밤바잔
정말 기분이 나아지네요

Subtitle: [Tahani] Yet another lie.
Translation:
이것도 거짓말이네요
당신이 그린 게 아니잖아요

Subtitle: You didn't paint this. You got Janet to do it.
Translation:
이것도 거짓말이네요
당신이 그린 게 아니잖아요 재닛한테 시켰죠?

Subtitle: No, no, no, Chidi did it.
I got you an awesome painting, but then he switched it / to this one because he said you'd like it more, / and he made me memorize stuff to say to you / so you wouldn't be so sad.
Translation:
당신 주려고 좋은 그림 구했는데
치디가 이거로 바꿔버렸어요 / 당신이 이걸 더 좋아할 거라면서 / 그리고 당신이 슬퍼하지 않게 / 그리고 당신이 슬퍼하지 않게 위로의 말도 외우게 했고

Subtitle: This is all his fault. You should yell at him.
Translation:
이건 다 치디의 잘못이에요
치디한테 화내야 해요

Subtitle: Chidi helped you make me happy.
Translation:
나 기분 좋게 하라고
도와준 거잖아요

Subtitle: It's almost as if he was trying to--
Oh...
Translation: 이건 완전 치디가 날... 어머, 이런

Subtitle: Oh, my.
Of course.
This is the cool painting I made.
This guy's famous. I mean, who even are those ladies?
Translation:
이 사람 유명해요
저 여자들은 누군지도 모르잖아요

Subtitle: Yeah, it would be easier to sort out the issue of dry erase versus paper / if I could write down the pros and cons for each, / but, of course, / I would have to use one of them to write down the pros and cons / for them, which is problematic.
Translation:
화이트보드와 종이의
문제점에 대한 장단점을 적어보면
더 쉬울 거예요 / 장단점을 적어보면
더 쉬울 거예요 하지만 당연히
장단점을 적으려면 / 하지만 당연히
장단점을 적으려면 / 둘 중 하나를 골라서
써야 하니까 / 그게 또 문제가 되죠

Subtitle: Wow.
[claps] Ethics team, how's it going?
-Terribly. -Cool.
Well, you guys are kind of my last hope, so that's not great.
Translation:
두 분이 내 마지막 희망인데
썩 좋은 소식은 아니군요

Subtitle: Hey, do you mind if I borrow Professor Stomach Ache here for a second?
Translation: 맨날 배 아프다는 이 사람 좀 빌려 가도 될까요?

Subtitle: Please, take him for an hour, take all the time you want.
[Eleanor] Okay, sit down, maybe.
I dated many annoying guys, okay?
Translation:
전 이상한 남자들
정말 많이 만나봤어요

Subtitle: They would call me all times of the day / "just to talk" or ask me if I'd taken cash out of their wallets, stupid stuff.
Translation:
시도 때도 없이 전화해서
'그냥 얘기'나 하자든가 / 내가 자기 지갑에서
돈을 빼갔냐고 물어보곤 했었죠

Subtitle: And, when I stopped having fun with them, I'd leave.
Usually, wouldn't even call or anything. I'd just bounce.
Translation:
그러다 재미없어지면
난 그냥 떠났어요 전화 한 통 없이 말이에요

Subtitle: Gotta go spend that money you stole.
Point is, you are way more of a buzz kill than any of those dudes.
Okay, thanks for this conversation.
But, somehow, I never want to leave you.
Translation: 하지만 왠지 모르게 당신은 절대 떠나기 싫어요

Subtitle: I want to stay in The Good Place because of you.
Translation:
당신 때문에
굿 플레이스에 남고 싶다고요

Subtitle: Because I love you.
I think.
No, I'm pretty sure. Yeah, I love you.
Oh, that's embarrassing. [chuckles] I feel so itchy. Sorry.
Don't say anything. I just needed to get that off my chest.
Translation:
아무 말도 하지 마요 그냥 내 마음을
털어놓고 싶었어요

Subtitle: Okay, I'm gonna go. Catch you later, silly billy.
Translation:
그럼 이제 가볼게요
이따가 봐요, 멍충이

Subtitle: Ugh! Love has made me a nerd.
Translation:
그럼 이제 가볼게요
이따가 봐요, 멍충이 사랑이 날 찌질이로 만들었어

Subtitle: Bye.
Jianyu's a fake.
He's not supposed to be here. Just like your "soul mate."
Translation:
여기 있으면 안 돼요
당신 가짜 소울메이트처럼요

Subtitle: More importantly, you did the ballerina painting / 'cause you were trying to protect my feelings, / because you love me.
Translation:
중요한 건 당신이
발레리나 그림을 그렸다는 거예요 / 내 기분 상하지 않도록요 / 날 사랑하니까

Subtitle: Oh, Chidi, don't you see?
Translation:
치디, 모르겠어요?
이게 바로 이곳에 생긴

Subtitle: This is the real mistake that was made in our neighborhood.
Translation:
치디, 모르겠어요?
이게 바로 이곳에 생긴 진짜 실수였던 거라고요

Subtitle: You and I are soul mates. It makes so much sense.
-Oh, but-- -No, Chidi, true love is rare, / like a desert flower betwixt two oases, / but true love's also very simple.
Translation:
- 하지만...
- 치디, 진정한 사랑은 드물어요 / 사막의 두 오아시스 사이에 핀
꽃처럼요 / 하지만 진정한 사랑은
간단하기도 해요

Subtitle: And, right now, I'm just a girl, towering over a boy, / asking him to admit he loves me.
Translation:
난 그저 한 소녀일 뿐이에요 소년을 내려다보며 / 나에 대한 사랑을 인정하라고
부탁하는 소녀라고요

Subtitle: I feel like her confession of love / was a lot better than mine. Can I get a do-over?
Translation:
타하니의 사랑 고백이 / 내 고백보다 더 낫네요
나도 다시 해도 돼요?

Subtitle: I need to step outside... For some air, / and I will not be back for many days.
Translation:
잠깐 좀 나가야겠어요
바람 좀 쐬러 / 나 한동안 안 돌아올 거예요

Subtitle: Dude, you can't just run away. You have to...
It looks calm now, but the storm is imminent. We're--
Translation:
지금은 잠잠해 보이지만
곧 폭풍이 오겠습니다 "잭 지츄
기상학자"

Subtitle: What's up, Carson Daly? My name is Jason.
I wanna give a shout-out to all my homies up in Jacksonville.
I am not Carson Daly. I'm a weather reporter.
A hurricane is coming. You need to seek shelter.
-I'm on TV! -Okay.
Translation:
대피소를 찾아야 해요 - 나 방송 탔다!
- 됐어요

Subtitle: Hey, Janet?
Hi, there. What are you watching?
My greatest accomplishment ever.
I'm trying to cheer myself up because I'm sad.
Translation:
지금 너무 슬퍼서
기분을 좀 달래고 있어요

Subtitle: I think I might be in big trouble.
Can you bring me something that will make me not sad?
Translation:
날 안 슬프게 만들 것 좀
가져다줄래요?

Subtitle: Let me think.
Sorry that took so long.
-Here you go. -Oh, dang.
Translation: 오래 걸려서 미안해요, 여기요 이건 내가 제일 좋아하는

Subtitle: Are these from my favorite restaurant, Stupid Nick's Wing Dump?
Translation:
멍청한 닉의 윙 덤프에서 파는
닭 날개네요?

Subtitle: Stupid Nick's closed down because a pelican fell in the flash fryer.
Translation:
멍청한 닉은 문을 닫았어요
펠리컨이 튀김기에 떨어져서요 하지만 못생긴 닉의 고기라는

Subtitle: But, he opened a new place, called Ugly Nick's Meat Trench.
Translation: 하지만 못생긴 닉의 고기라는 새 식당이 문을 열었어요

Subtitle: These are an exact replica of that recipe.
Translation:
이건 멍청한 닉과
똑같은 조리법으로 만든 거고요

Subtitle: Why are you so nice to me?
Well, you were very nice to me while I was rebooting.
Also, I'm programmed to be nice to everyone.
Janet? I just realized something.
I love you.
Okay.
I have one more question for you.
So, you also love Chidi, and you just told him, / just now, right before I did?
Translation:
그러니까 치디를 사랑한다고
방금 고백했다고요? / 지금? 내 고백 바로 전에? 당신은 치디가 당신 좋아한다고
한 거지만, 아무튼 그래요

Subtitle: Technically, you told him that he loves you, but yes.
Translation:
당신은 치디가 당신 좋아한다고
한 거지만, 아무튼 그래요

Subtitle: This isn't ideal.
We must remain civil.
He's simply going to have to pick one of us, / and the loser will just have to accept her fate, with grace and equanimity.
Translation:
치디가 우리 둘 중
한 명을 선택할 거고 패자는 그냥 그 운명을
받아들이면 돼요 / 패자는 그냥 그 운명을
받아들이면 돼요 품위와 평정심을
유지하면서 말이죠

Subtitle: Maybe if you lose.
If he doesn't pick me, I'mma start throwing stuff.
Translation:
치디가 날 선택하지 않는다면
난 물건을 집어 던질 거예요

Subtitle: Classy as always.
I suppose you knew that Jianyu was a fake, didn't you?
Yes, I did.
Figured you two charlatans would sniff each other out / like two mangy rats sharing a pizza crust in a sewer--
Translation:
하수구에 떨어진
피자 끝부분이나 나눠 먹는 / 더러운 쥐새끼들처럼 사기나 치고...

Subtitle: Okay... No.
We're not gonna do this.
We are not gonna be those women who fight over a guy, / and find any excuse to rip each other apart.
Translation:
남자 하나를 두고 싸우면서
서로 헐뜯을 것만 찾아대는 / 그런 여자들이 될 순 없어요

Subtitle: I am not going to apologize for being angry.
Translation: 내가 화낸 건 사과 안 할 거예요

Subtitle: You knew that my soul mate was lying to me.
Translation:
내 소울메이트가
거짓말하는 거 알고 있었잖아요

Subtitle: Yes, I did, and I'm very sorry.
Listen, you and I have a weird, complicated, forked-up friendship, / but it's our friendship, / and I care about it. Let's do something fun.
Translation:
우리 우정은 이상하고 복잡하고 아주 개판이지만
그래도 그게 우리 우정이고 / 아주 개판이지만
그래도 그게 우리 우정이고 / 나에게는 소중해요 같이 재밌는 걸 해봐요

Subtitle: What would make you feel happy, right now?
Translation:
지금 당장 뭘 하면
기분이 좋아질까요?

Subtitle: You have a fine home, Deirdre.
I absolutely adore your chaise.
[Deirdre] I don't know bugger all about a chaise--
Translation: 전 그런 건 전혀 몰라요 이걸 변기로 쓰고 있었지 뭐예요

Subtitle: I been using this as a bloody toilet, I have.
-What's this show called, again? -[laughs] It's Deirdre and Margaret.
It ran for 16 years on the BBC. They did nearly 30 episodes.
It's about two women from very different worlds / who become friends, sort of like us.
Translation:
완전히 다른 세상에서 온
두 여자가 친구가 되는 내용이에요 / 우리처럼요

Subtitle: Oh, Deirdre, no! That's priceless art!
Translation:
데어드리, 안 돼요
이거 비싼 작품이라고요

Subtitle: I thought it was fruit, innit?
Deirdre.
-I take it the moron is me? -Well, it's not a direct parallel.
Translation: 저 멍청이가 나라는 뜻이죠? 완전히 똑같지는 않아요

Subtitle: Okay, we did your thing. Now, it's my turn.
Translation:
좋아요
당신이 좋아하는 걸 했으니 이제는 내 차례예요

Subtitle: Are you ready to take our bonding to the next level?
Translation:
우리의 우정을
한 단계 발전시켜 볼까요?

Subtitle: Oh, good, you're back.
I, uh... I know we're short on time, / but I need your help with a personal dilemma.
Translation:
네, 시간이 없는 건 알지만 / 개인적인 고민이 있어서
도움이 필요해요

Subtitle: This is about Fake Eleanor and Real Eleanor.
Translation:
가짜 엘리너와 진짜 엘리너에
관련된 일인가요?

Subtitle: Yes. Which person is my soul mate?
Real Eleanor, that's what the system determined.
-Okay. -Of course, / the system did screw up by letting Fake Eleanor in.
Translation:
- 알겠습니다
- 하지만 / 그 시스템이 가짜 엘리너를
데려오기도 했죠

Subtitle: You know, it's interesting. Fake Eleanor being selected accidentally / and then you bonding with her could have shifted the formula.
Translation:
재미있네요 실수로 가짜 엘리너가 선택된 후 / 둘이 친해진 거라면
공식이 바뀌었을 수도 있어요

Subtitle: But, it's one of those two people.
Well, I... I don't know.
I mean, the system might be so screwed up at this point, / that maybe you don't belong to either Eleanor.
Translation:
글쎄, 모르겠어요
시스템 오류가 심각하다면 지금 상황에선 누구와도
안 이뤄질 수도 있어요 / 지금 상황에선 누구와도
안 이뤄질 수도 있어요

Subtitle: -You is spreading... -What?
Your indecisiveness is infecting me like a virus.
Oh, Chidi, this could send us down a very dangerous path.
Translation:
치디, 이러다 아주 위험한 길로
빠질 수도 있어요

Subtitle: If you can't make a choice, this whole neighborhood could fall apart.
Translation:
당신이 결정을 못 내리면 굿 플레이스 전체가
무너져 내릴 거라고요

Subtitle: Okay, getting close here.
Just mulling the ethical ramifications of various soups.
Translation:
좋아요, 거의 다 됐어요 다양한 수프의 윤리적 영향을
숙고하는 중이에요

Subtitle: Oh, same old Chidi.
I can come back for a fifth time.
Yeah, you know, maybe that's smart.
-How are you? Uzo, it's been too long. -It has, it has.
Translation:
어떻게 지냈어, 우조?
진짜 오랜만이야 그렇지, 너도 알다시피

Subtitle: Look, as you know, Ellen and I are engaged.
Translation:
그렇지, 너도 알다시피 나 엘렌과 약혼했잖아
넌 내 가장 오랜 친구고

Subtitle: You're my oldest friend, and I love you like a brother, / and that's why I'd like you to not be my best man.
Translation:
나 엘렌과 약혼했잖아
넌 내 가장 오랜 친구고 널 내 형제처럼 사랑해 / 그래서 내 들러리는
네가 안 맡았으면 해

Subtitle: -Sorry? -Look, if you were my best man, / you'd have to plan the bachelor party, decide what to say in your toast, / handle problems that pop up the day of.
Translation:
- 뭐라고?
- 네가 내 들러리가 되면 / 총각 파티도 계획해야 할 거고 건배사에서 어떤 말을 할지
정해야 하고 / 당일 생기는 문제도
네가 처리해야 해

Subtitle: It would drive you up the wall.
Well, Uzo, this isn't choosing soccer teams on a playground.
Translation:
우조, 이건 운동장에서
축구팀 고르는 게 아니잖아

Subtitle: When some thing's important to me, I can make a decision. Watch.
Translation:
나한테 중요한 일이라면
나도 결정할 수 있어

Subtitle: Uh, excuse me, excuse me.
I have decided I would like / -to unequivocally order the pumpkin soup. -Perfect.
Translation:
저 결정했어요 / 저 결정했어요 정확하고 분명하게
호박 수프를 주문할게요 알겠습니다

Subtitle: You kind of want to change your order.
Yeah, I don't know what I was thinking.
Translation:
그래, 나도 내가
무슨 생각이었는지 모르겠다

Subtitle: -Yeah. -Excuse me, risotto. Risotto?
[Tahani] As much as I'm enjoying this, / shouldn't we be working on your case to try and stay here?
Translation:
이것도 재밌기는 한데 / 여기 계속 있으려면
해결책을 찾아야 하지 않아요?

Subtitle: Honestly, how am I gonna help them? They are much smarter than me.
Translation:
솔직히 내가
무슨 도움이 되겠어요? 그들이 훨씬 똑똑하잖아요
하지만 머리 꾸미는 건

Subtitle: Now, hair extensions? This is where I shine.
Translation:
그들이 훨씬 똑똑하잖아요
하지만 머리 꾸미는 건

Subtitle: You were already at almost-maximum hotness, / but now you look like a sexy, tan Rapunzel.
Translation:
내가 훨씬 잘해요 당신은 이미 거의 최고로
섹시하지만 / 이제는 태닝한 라푼젤 같잖아요

Subtitle: [sighs] The dream.
And, how exactly did you learn how to do this?
When I was 14, I had to make myself look older to get a job.
Translation:
14살 때 일자리 구하려고
늙어 보여야 했거든요

Subtitle: These were the ones I used, and they are real cheap.
Translation:
이 방법을 주로 썼죠
돈이 많이 안 들거든요

Subtitle: You're gonna want to stay away from open flames, / and altercations at outlet malls.
Translation: 앞으로 불이 있는 곳이나 / 싸움 난 곳은 피해요

Subtitle: Hey...
I'm really sorry that I didn't tell you about Jianyu, / and that you got saddled with him.
Translation:
지안유에 대해
얘기 안 한 거 미안해요 / 지안유에 대해
얘기 안 한 거 미안해요 그리고 지안유를 떠넘긴 것도요

Subtitle: Yes, that is regrettable, but...
I forgive you.
Maybe you two are soul mates.
Holy shirt. Maybe we are.
I know it seems crazy, but think about it, / Jianyu is a hot dummy, definitely my type.
Translation:
미친 소리 같지만 생각해봐요 / 섹시하고 멍청하잖아요
완전 내 스타일이에요

Subtitle: We both love to dance, we were both banned / from public transit systems in our cities.
Translation:
우리 둘 다 춤추는 걸 좋아하고
각자 살던 곳에서 / 대중교통 블랙 리스트에 올랐어요

Subtitle: I think this is the answer!
People come in pairs here, and if the system paired us up, / then maybe somehow I do belong here with him.
Translation:
여긴 쌍으로 오는 곳이잖아요
우리가 쌍으로 엮였다면 / 지안유와 같이
굿 플레이스에 있어야 하나 봐요

Subtitle: Hi, there.
Jason and I are getting married in ten minutes, / and you're invited.
Translation:
제이슨과 제가
10분 후에 결혼해요 두 분도 초대할게요 / 두 분도 초대할게요 "일정 비워 놓으세요"

Subtitle: Here, we've got your soul mate options, / Eleanor, Real Eleanor, / and a theoretical third person.
Translation:
여기 당신의
소울메이트 옵션이 있어요 / 엘리너 진짜 엘리너, 그리고
이론상의 세 번째 인물 / 진짜 엘리너, 그리고
이론상의 세 번째 인물

Subtitle: Let's call her strawberry mango twist.
Translation:
이 사람을...
딸기 망고 트위스트라고 합시다

Subtitle: Okay, close your eyes.
Think about each of the women.
Open your eyes.
-The answer is Real Eleanor. -How do you know?
I don't, but the minute I said that, / you knew instinctively whether it felt right.
Translation:
몰라요, 하지만 제가
그걸 말한 순간 / 당신은 직감적으로
이게 옳단 걸 알았잖아요

Subtitle: Well, hang on, let me think about that.
-Because it-- -No, no.
No more thinking, Chidi. Just do something.
Translation:
더 이상 생각하지 마요, 치디
그냥 뭐든 해요

Subtitle: Indecision caused you so much agony in your life, / right up to the very end.
Translation:
망설임은 당신의 인생에
많은 고통만 줬어요 / 마지막 순간까지도요

Subtitle: I had a little trouble writing my speech.
Translation:
건배사를 쓰는 데
문제가 좀 있었어

Subtitle: Um, I wrote 11 different versions.
Wedding's in 20 minutes, buddy.
Oh, boy, I mean, these run about 55 minutes a piece.
I'm really hot!
Is this air-conditioner even working?
[Uzo] Yes, it is.
You're just having a literal meltdown.
Translation:
말 그대로 녹아버려서 그래
옷도 아직 안 입었고

Subtitle: Also, you're not dressed yet, and we haven't picked up the rings.
Translation:
말 그대로 녹아버려서 그래
옷도 아직 안 입었고 우린 반지도 못 골랐다고

Subtitle: Okay, well, there's an issue there.
Uh, involving what I consider to be unfair labor practices / on the part of the jeweler.
Translation: 부당 노동 행위로 보이는 / 문제가 있었어 총각 파티도 못 했고 말이야

Subtitle: And we never had a bachelor party / because you could never settle on a location or time.
Translation:
총각 파티도 못 했고 말이야 / 네가 장소랑 시간을
못 정했으니까

Subtitle: I'm sorry.
You were right. This is too much for me.
Translation: 미안해, 네가 맞았어 이건 나한테 힘든 일이야

Subtitle: You should just leave me here and go get married.
Yeah, here's the thing, bud, / my wedding isn't for another month.
Translation: 그래, 잘 들어봐 / 결혼식은 다음 달이야

Subtitle: This was a test to see if you could handle being my best man, / and, just as I predicted, you failed, miserably.
Translation:
이건 네가 잘할 수 있을지
확인하려는 시험이었어 / 내 예상대로 넌
비참하게 실패했고

Subtitle: Oh, no. No, I mean, I'm relieved, but this is embarrassing.
Translation: 이런, 그래도 안심이다 하지만 좀 당황스럽네

Subtitle: It's okay, bud.
Obviously, I prepared for this. Let's just go have a nice night.
Translation: 난 다 예상했거든 오늘은 그냥 놀자

Subtitle: I'll buy you a beer.
Thirty minutes, Chidi?
We have been trying to pick a bar for 30 minutes.
It is literally impossible to be your friend.
You're incapable of making a single decision.
Translation:
뭐 하나 결정하는 것도
제대로 못 하잖아

Subtitle: Look, I know I can be indecisive, / but what's the harm in taking a few extra minutes / to find the perfect--
Translation:
내가 우유부단할 때도 있지만 / 완벽한 것을 찾으려고
몇 분 더 고민하는 게 / 뭐가 그렇게...

Subtitle: Chidi?
You're right. I just need to make a decision.
Translation:
당신이 맞아요
전 결정을 내려야 해요

Subtitle: I'm gonna look each of these women in the eye, trust my gut, / and figure out how I feel.
Translation:
이 여자들을 직접 만나
눈을 보면서 직감으로 / 제 감정을 알아낼게요

Subtitle: You're kidding. That worked?
Great! Go do it!
[Jianyu] Ladies and gentlemen, let's get ready to marry!
Translation:
신사 숙녀 여러분
결혼할 준비 합시다

Subtitle: Yo, check it.
[Eleanor] This is great.
At different moments during our time here, / we both thought that Tragic Mike over here was our one true love, / and now he is marrying whatever Janet is.
Translation:
여기 있는 동안
서로 다른 때에 / 우리 둘 다 저 인간이
진정한 사랑인 줄 알았는데 / 이젠 재닛이라는 저 물건과
결혼을 하다니

Subtitle: I suppose you're right. It is a bit strange.
I'd like to read a poem.
Janet, my digital queen / Janet, we can dare to dream / Send nude pics of your heart to me.
Translation:
'재닛, 나의 디지털 여왕님' / '재닛, 우린
꿈을 꿀 수 있어요' / '당신 심장 누드 사진을
보내주세요'

Subtitle: -[chokes] -Jacksonville Jaguars rule!
Jason, when I was rebooted, and I lost all my knowledge, / I was confused and disoriented, but you were always kind to me.
Translation:
제이슨, 난 재부팅되면서
모든 지식을 잃었어요 / 정말 혼란스러웠지만 당신은 항상 친절했어요

Subtitle: And, according to the central theme / of 231,600 songs, movies, poems, and novels / that I researched for these vows in the last three seconds, / that's what love's all about.
Translation:
지금 3초 동안
이 서약을 위해 조사한 / 지금 3초 동안
이 서약을 위해 조사한 231,600개의 노래, 영화
시, 그리고 소설의 / 중심 주제에 따르면 / 그게 사랑의 전부예요

Subtitle: Does anybody here object to this marriage?
-Yes, it is a terrible idea. -Of course we do. How could we not object?
-Overruled. Jason? -Mmm-hmm.
-Do you want me to be your wife? -Yeah.
-I want you to be my husband. -Tight.
So, by the power vested in me, by me, I now pronounce us husband and wife.
Translation:
- 좋아요
- 그럼 제 권한으로 우리는 이제 남편과 아내가
되었음을 선언합니다

Subtitle: We did it!
Can I kiss you, or will I be electrocuted?
Only one way to find out.
Whoo! Get some! Got get it, girl!
-I'm just going with it now. -[chuckles]
[Tahani] It's funny.
Translation:
지안유가 내 소울메이트가
아니란 걸 알고는

Subtitle: I was devastated when I found out that he wasn't my soul mate, / but now I think I've dodged a bullet.
Translation:
지안유가 내 소울메이트가
아니란 걸 알고는 가슴이 미어지는 것 같았는데
이제 보니 / 그게 천만다행이네요

Subtitle: He's a simple man.
I once watched him eat electrical tape right off the roll.
Translation:
지안유가 절연 테이프를
먹는 것도 봤어요

Subtitle: He thought it was a Fruit by the Foot that had gone bad.
Translation:
과일 맛 테이프가
상한 줄 알았대요

Subtitle: Thank you for being such a great friend to me today.
Translation:
오늘 좋은 친구가 되어줘서
정말 고마워요

Subtitle: Of course, hot stuff. I got your back.
Eleanor, hey, I just wanted to see if you'd talked to Chidi.
Uh, yeah, I did.
I mean, you don't have to tell me what you said.
Translation:
무슨 말을 했는지는
얘기할 필요 없어요

Subtitle: I just wanted to see if you're okay.
Translation:
그냥 당신이 괜찮은지
보러 온 거예요

Subtitle: Oh, man, you are a good person.
I swear, if I had known you and Tahani and Chidi on Earth, / I might have for real gotten into The Good Place.
Translation:
맹세하는데, 지구에서 당신과
타하니, 치디를 알았더라면 / 전 정말 굿 플레이스에
올 수 있었을지도 몰라요

Subtitle: Oh! Hey, it's my three favorite yogurts.
Translation:
이런 3가지 맛 요거트가 전부
여기 있었네요

Subtitle: Hey, um, about what happened earlier...
I've been kind of all over the place today.
Translation:
오늘 나한테 굉장히
많은 일이 있었어요

Subtitle: An hour ago, I thought Jianyu was my soul mate, / and the fact that that kind of made sense / means you and I could never be meant for each other.
Translation:
1시간 전엔 지안유가
내 소울메이트라고 생각했죠 / 꽤 그럴싸하기도 했고요 / 그 말은 우린
함께할 운명이 아니라는 뜻이죠

Subtitle: Plus, Jianyu's married to Janet now.
Okay.
What?
I do love you, but I think more / in a best friend, afterlife-savior kind of way.
Translation:
나 당신 정말 사랑해요 / 하지만 사후에 날 구해준
좋은 친구라는 의미에서죠

Subtitle: I'm not so much "hot for teacher"
as I am eternally grateful for "semi-cute, surprisingly ripped teacher."
Translation: 조금 귀여운 몸짱 선생님께 평생 감사하며 사는 스타일이에요

Subtitle: Chidi, I also have to apologize.
It's just that when I found out that Jianyu wasn't my soul mate, / I desperately needed something to keep me afloat, / and, well, you were the nearest lifeboat, as it were.
Translation:
지안유가 내 소울메이트가
아니란 걸 깨달았을 때 / 정말 나를 붙잡아 줄
무언가가 필요했어요 / 하필 당신이 가장 가까이 있던
구명정이었던 셈이고요

Subtitle: And, yes, we do have the sort of connection / that only two highly-educated, sophisticates could have, / but it's not true love.
Translation:
물론 교양 있는 두 고학력자가 / 공통점을 느꼈을 수는 있죠 / 하지만 그건 진정한
사랑이 아니에요

Subtitle: True love is what Janet and Jianyu have.
Yeah. What?
Oh, we would love to stay and chat, but we need to find Michael.
Translation:
계속 얘기하고 싶지만
마이클을 찾아야 해요

Subtitle: Eleanor, I think I figured out a way for you to stay.
Translation:
엘리너, 당신이
여기 있을 방법이 생각났어요

Subtitle: [gasps] Really? I'll come, too.
